original_text:
FINAL DISCHARGE DIAGNOSES :
1. Upper gastrointestinal bleed .
2. Gastroesophageal reflux disease .
3. History of esophagitis .
4. Left lower lobe pneumonia .
5. Hypertension .
6. Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease .
7. Abdominal aortic aneurysm .
8. Decubitus ulcers .
9. Anemia of chronic disease .
10. Malnutrition .
11. Dehydration .
12. History of cerebrovascular accident .
DISCHARGE MEDICATIONS :
1. Acetaminophen 650 mg q. 6h. p.r.n.
2. Augmentin 875 mg q. 8h. for 5 days .
3. Ascorbic acid 500 mg daily via the G tube .
4. DuoNeb breathing treatments as needed .
5. Procrit 10000 units every week for 1 month .
6. Cephulac syrup via the G tube twice a day .
7. Prevacid 30 mg twice a day .
8. Zestril 5 mg via the G tube daily .
9. Reglan 5 mg via the G tube 4 times a day .
10. Therapeutic - M tablet daily .
11. Zinc oxide ointment daily .
PERTINENT CONSULTATIONS :
1. Dr. **NAME[UUU] .
2. Dr. **NAME[TTT] .
HOSPITAL COURSE :
The patient is an **AGE[in 80s]- year-old African American male who presented on account of coffee - ground emesis .
The patient is wheelchair bound and nonverbal at baseline .
He was recently discharged when he presented with the same situation .
The patient aspirated about 200 mg of coffee - ground aspirate via the G tube .
There was no associated abdominal pain .
On examination at admission , he had decreased air entry in the left basal lung fields , and he had coarse crackles .
Stool GU done in the ER was negative , but the aspirate from the G tube was guaiac positive .
The patient was made n.p.o. and was started on IV Protonix , and his hematocrit and hemoglobin were monitored .
He also had an elevated BUN while he was admitted .
BUN was 42 .
The patient was hydrated , and he had no recurrence of the GI bleed while on admission .
G-tube feeds were restarted , and the patient did not have any repeat episodes .
He was discharged home stable to follow up in the **INSTITUTION in three days .
______________________________
**NAME[WWW VVV XXX] , M.D.
HS Job # 885655 / 35282 /
# **ID-NUM
D : **DATE[May 22 2007] 18:05
T : **DATE[May 24 2007] 17:29
